full_threads.body:

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

https://shellshockedmedia.com/video-production/

HI again,

Last thing.

can we line up the pricing please.

Thank You.

Hi Darren,

I have made the changes.

Here's the link:
https://shellshockedmedia.com/corporate-instagram-stories/

Let me know if you need further assistance.

On the 'Corporate Social Media' page

&

can I change 'Carnival Splendor Melbourne Cup Cruise 2023 Event Video' to 'Carnival Melbourne Cup Cruise 2023 Event Video' so it will also be on one line.

thank you

Hi Darren,

Sure, I have updated it.

Here's the link:
https://shellshockedmedia.com/video-production/

Let me know if you need further assistance.

Hi,

On the 'Production page'

down the bottom, can you reduce the gap here please.

* Pre-Production

full_threads.body:
The following was sent back to me a few times as unsent.

I am sorry if you have already received this.



Hi Support,

Ive got 3 pages that need work please:


Corporate Social Media
First can we change the following video names please:

'Shelly Horton MC Show Reel 2024 Video 1'
change to
'Shelly Horton MC 2024 Event Video 1'

'Shelly Horton MC Show Reel 2024 Video 2'
change to
'Shelly Horton MC 2024 Event Video 2'

'Carnival Splendor Melbourne Cup Cruise 2023'
change to '
Carnival Splendor Melbourne Cup Cruise 2023 Event Video'

Second can we add the following Pricing to 'Corporate Social Media' page please.

In the white area above the Videos and below 'Step into the spotlight and let your corporate video do the talking'.
Full Event Video (Vertical)
4 x 4K Cameras, Live Event Shoot plus 2 Channels of Audio & Testimonials $1,500.00
Up to 20min Video will take 1 Day Turn Around for Editing $500.00
Up to 40min Video will take 2 Days Turn Around for Editing $1,000.00
Up to 60min Video will take 3 Days Turn Around for Editing $1,500.00

Event Video (Vertical)
Quick Turn Around, 24hrs Social Media Videos.
Filming, plus 2 Channels of Audio & Editing.
1 x 60sec Video will take Quick Turn Around 24hrs $750.00
2 x 60sec Video will take Quick Turn Around 24hrs $1,000.00

*Prices Include 1 round of edits.
*Multi Track recordings (More than 2 Channels) are available. Pricing will depend on a client's brief.
*Client must provide someone to ask questions for Testimonials.
*Music must be selected before Filming to prevent Copyright & Royalty delays.
*Length & aspect ratio depends on social media/website platform requirements.
*A version without music can be supplied so Event Video can be repurposed on secondary media sites without Copyright delays.
*Basic graphic supers are included. We have the inhouse ability and connections to complete all motion graphic requirement. Additional pricing will depend on a clients brief with graphic references. Additional graphics may prolong estimated video delivery times.

Video Production
First can we change the following video name please:

'Only Plans'
change to
'Only Plans Events'

Second can we add the following Pricing to 'Video Production' page please.
In the white area above the Videos and below 'These days video content is vital, and our content has client audiences laughing & learning'.
Full Event Video (Horizontal)
4 x 4K Cameras, Event Shoot plus 2 Channels of Audio & testimonials $1,500.00
Up to 20min Video will take 1 Day Turn Around for Editing $500.00
Up to 40min Video will take 2 Days Turn Around for Editing $1,000.00
Up to 60min Video will take 3 Days Turn Around for Editing $1,500.00

Video Production (Horizontal)
Cameras, Lighting & 2 Channels of Audio $1,500.00 Per 8 Hour Day
includes travel from Palm Beach, setup & pack down
Any additional hours will be charged at $190/hour
Editing $500.00 Per Day

Event Video (Horizontal)
Quick Turn Around, 24hrs Social Media Videos
Filming, plus 2 Channels of Audio & Editing
1 x 60sec Video will take Quick Turn Around 24hrs $750.00
2 x 60sec Video will take Quick Turn Around 24hrs $1,000.00

* Pre-Production: creating brief, run-sheet, shot-lists, talent, location, script writing, props are not included, however happy to quote.
*Prices Include 1 round of edits.
*Multi Track recordings (More than 2 Channels) are available. Pricing will depend on a client's brief.
*Client must provide someone to ask questions for Testimonials.
*Music must be selected before Filming to prevent Copyright & Royalty delays.
*Length & aspect ratio depends on social media/website platform requirements.
*A version without music can be supplied so Event Video can be repurposed on secondary media sites without Copyright delays.
*Basic graphic supers are included. We have the inhouse ability and connections to complete all motion graphic requirement. Additional pricing will depend on a clients brief with graphic references. Additional graphics may prolong estimated video delivery times.

Online Course Creation

Can we add the following to 'Online Course Creation' page please.

In the white area above the Videos and below 'Hello passive income!'.

Airconditioned Studio with 4K Camera, Audio Recording, Teleprompter & Lighting Hire
Green Screen Dimensions: 3.6W/3.6L/2.5H

Then Add side by side Left to right 'Studio 1.jpg' & 'Studio 2jpg' also in the white area please.



Darren Robinson
0417445075
https://shellshockedmedia.com
